alert.note: Alert for East Salmon River Mountains, Salmon NF; Sawtooth Range, Northern Sawtooth NF (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 09 at 2:46PM MDT until September 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR FOR WIDESPREAD HAINES INDEX OF 6 AND AN EXTREMELY DRY ENVIRONMENT SUPPORTING SIGNIFICANT WILDFIRE ACTIVITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 422 AND 475... The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a Fire Weather Watch for widespread Haines Index of 6 and an extremely dry environment supporting significant wildfire activity, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 422 Sawtooth Range/Northern Sawtooth NF and Fire Weather Zone 475 East Salmon River Mountains/Salmon NF. * TIMING...12 PM Sunday through 12 AM Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * HAINES INDEX...6. * IMPACTS...Very dry and unstable atmosphere may support rapid fire growth on new and existing wildfires.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: East Salmon River Mountains, Salmon NF; Sawtooth Range, Northern Sawtooth NF
